tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE research_articles (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title TEXT,
  abstract TEXT,
  author_name TEXT,
  publication_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE articles (
  article_id INT,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  abstract TEXT,
  author_id INT,
  publication_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE articles (
 article_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 author_id INT NOT NULL,
 publication_date DATE NOT NULL
)
